## MentionExtensionAttrs type

The attrs that will be added to the node. ID and label are plucked and used while attributes like href and role can be assigned as desired.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MentionExtensionAttrs = Attrs<OptionalMentionExtensionParams & {
    id: string;
    label: string;
}>;
```
